message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.RO 

This paper deals with the problem of recovering 3D human body mesh from single images and monocular videos, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the use of deep learning techniques, which suggests that it could belong to cs.MM (Multimedia), cs.LG (Machine Learning), or cs.RO (Robotics). Finally, the paper deals with the problem of modeling human motion, which could suggest that it belongs to cs.GR (Graphics).
